data.title: Carly Pearce announces ‘Hummingbird World Tour.’ Get tickets today
data.meta_description: Country star Carly Pearce just announced her 2024-25 'Hummingbird World Tour' with special guests Karley Scott Collins, Matt Lang, Wade Bowen and Carter Faith. She will perform in Salamanca, NY.
data.text:
One of country’s biggest stars is going international.

Carly Pearce just announced she’s heading out on her ‘Hummingbird World Tour’ that will send her to venues all over the globe this year and next in support of her recently released album that shares a name with the tour.

Special guests Karley Scott Collins, Matt Lang, Wade Bowen and Carter Faith will join Pearce on select dates.

“I’m just so excited to bring this album to life,” the 34-year-old Kentucky native said in an interview with Billboard. “These songs have been such a big part of my healing process and they deserve to be celebrated.”

And, while the “I Hope You’re Happy Now” singer won’t visit the five boroughs on the run, she’ll get close when she headlines at Waterloo, NY’s Del Lago Resort and Casino on Saturday, Aug. 10 and Salamanca, NY’s Seneca Allegany Casino on Friday, March 28, 2025.

Fans can purchase tickets for all upcoming North American Carly Pearce shows on sites like Vivid Seats; the official on-sale is Friday, Aug. 16.

Vivid Seats is a secondary market ticketing platform, and prices may be higher or lower than face value, depending on demand.

They have a 100% buyer guarantee that states your transaction will be safe and secure and will be delivered before the event.

Carly Pearce tour schedule 2024

A complete calendar of all North American ‘Hummingbird Tour’ dates, venues and links to buy tickets can be found below.

Carly Pearce set list

Prior to the tour, Pearce served as a special guest on Tim McGraw’s ‘Standing Room Only Tour.’ While she’ll likely play more songs at shows on this upcoming jaunt, here’s what she took to the stage at her last McGraw gig, according to Set List FM:

01.) “Rock Paper Scissors”

02.) “Next Girl”

03.) “Easy Going/Why Not Me”

04.) “Never Wanted to Be That Girl”

05.) “Let’s Go to Vegas” (Faith Hill cover)

06.) “we don’t fight anymore”

07.) “Fault Line”

08.) “Every Little Thing”

09.) “Truck on Fire”

10.) “What He Didn’t Do”

11.) “I Hope You’re Happy Now”

Carly Pearce new music

On June 7, Pearce released her fourth studio album “hummingbird.”

Comprised of 14 emotional and evocative tracks, the record shows off Pearce’s down to Earth storytelling through song. Highlights include the powerhouse duet “we don’t fight anymore” with Chris Stapleton, boot scootin’ good time “rock paper scissors” and searing “woman to woman.”

Make sure to stay the gorgeously arranged title track “hummingbird” at the end, too. It’s a wallop.

If you want to hear for yourself, “hummingbird” can be found here.

Carly Pearce special guests

As noted above, Pearce has quite the opening act roster.

To make sure you’re familiar with each artist’s sound, you can find their most-streamed song here:

Karley Scott Collins: “Heavenly”

Matt Lang: “Love Me Some You”

Wade Bowen: “Who I Am”

Carter Faith: “Greener Pasture”

Country stars on tour in 2024

Many iconic acts who boot and scoot with the best of them will be out and about these next few months.

Here are just five of our favorites you won’t want to sleep on.

• Maddie and Tae

• Lainey Wilson

• Kacey Musgraves

• Ashley McBryde

• Maren Morris

Who else is on the road? Take a look at our list of the 50 biggest country stars on tour in 2024 to find the show for you.

Why you should trust ‘Post Wanted’ by the New York Post
